PARAM.NAME: OP_FLAVOR
PARAM.DESC: # Select WLAN operation "flavor": # 1 --> unidev [single device, no concurrency, no P2P] # 2 --> unidev_p2p [single device, no concurrency, with P2P] # 3 --> p2p+sta_scc [single-chan concurrency, w/P2P+STA] # 4 --> p2p+sta_mcc [multi-chan concurrency, w/P2P+STA] # 5 --> ap+sta_scc [single-chan concurrency, w/AP+STA] # 6 --> ap+sta_mcc [multi-channel concurrency, w/AP+STA] # 7 --> ap+sta_scc+bt [5 + BT stack + BT coex] # 8 --> ap+sta_mcc+bt [6 + BT stack + BT coex] # 9 --> ap+sta_mcc+aws [6 + aws] # 10--> ap+sta_mcc+mesh [6 + mesh] # 11--> ap+sta_mcc+homekit [6 + homekit] # Default is "unidev".

PARAM.NAME: BAND
PARAM.DESC: # Select WLAN bands: # 1 --> single-band [2.4GHz only] # 2 --> dual-band [2.4GHz or 5GHz] # # Default is dual-band.

PARAM.NAME: SNTPCLNT_ENABLE
PARAM.DESC: # SNTP Client disposition # 0 --> Disabled # 1 --> Enabled # Default is ???

PARAM.NAME: DNSCLNT_ENABLE
PARAM.DESC: # DNS Client disposition # 0 --> Disabled # 1 --> Enabled # Default is ???

PARAM.NAME: DNSSERV_ENABLE
PARAM.DESC: # DNS Server disposition # 0 --> Disabled # 1 --> Enabled # Default is ???

PARAM.NAME: BRIDGEMODE_ENABLE
PARAM.DESC: # Bridge Mode disposition # 0 --> Disabled # 1 --> Enabled # Default is ???

PARAM.NAME: COUNTRY_CODE
PARAM.DESC: # Three-byte numeric Country Code. # Default is determined by Board Data.

PARAM.NAME: ATH_TXBUF
PARAM.DESC: # Number of buffers to use for WLAN Transmit. # Default is 4.

PARAM.NAME: ATH_RXBUF
PARAM.DESC: # Number of buffers to use for WLAN Receive. # Default is 16.

PARAM.NAME: ATH_MGMTBUF
PARAM.DESC: # Number of buffers to use for WLAN management. # Default is 12.

PARAM.NAME: NUM_IRAM_BANKS
PARAM.DESC: # Number of configurable 32KB banks for use as Instruction RAM. # There are a total of 16 32KB banks that can be switched between # Instructions (IRAM) and Data (DRAM). # Default is 0 bank of IRAM and 16 banks of DRAM.

PARAM.NAME: GPIO0_ACTIVE_CONFIG
PARAM.DESC: # GPIO Configuration for each GPIO pin to be used when # the pin (or its associated peripheral) is ACTIVE. # Default is defined by system firmware.

PARAM.NAME: GPIO0_INACTIVE_CONFIG
PARAM.DESC: # GPIO Configuration for each GPIO pin to be used when # the pin (or its associated peripheral) is INACTIVE. # Default is defined by system firmware.

PARAM.NAME: GPIO0_PERIPHERAL_ID
PARAM.DESC: # Mapping for each GPIO pin to a peripheral ID. # Default is defined by system firmware. # Standard system peripheral IDs: # 0 --> unused # 1 --> TBD # 2 --> TBD

PARAM.NAME: PARTITION_ENTRY_1
PARAM.DESC: # Start byte of flash partition #1

PARAM.NAME: PARTITION_ENTRY_2
PARAM.DESC: # Start byte of flash partition #2

PARAM.NAME: PARTITION_ENTRY_3
PARAM.DESC: # Start byte of flash partition #3

PARAM.NAME: FLASH_CAPACITY
PARAM.DESC: # Capacity (in bytes) of the SPI serial flash part. # Defaults to 2MB (8Mb).

PARAM.NAME: FLASH_BLOCKSIZE
PARAM.DESC: # Size of a flash block, determined by flash part in use. # Default is 64KB

PARAM.NAME: FLASH_SECTORSIZE
PARAM.DESC: # Size of a flash sector, determined by flash part in use. # Default is 4KB.

PARAM.NAME: FLASH_PAGESIZE
PARAM.DESC: # Size of a flash page, determined by flash part in use. # Default is 256B.

PARAM.NAME: RODATASET_START
PARAM.DESC: # Partition-relative offset in flash of the ReadOnly DataSet area. # Upper 8 bits are interpreted as a partition number: # 0 --> partition 0 # 1 --> partition 1 # 2 --> partition 2 # 3 --> partition 3 # 0xff --> whatever software partition is in use # Default is 32KB before the start of the RW DataSet area

PARAM.NAME: RWDATASET_START
PARAM.DESC: # Partition-relative offset in flash of the Read/Write DataSet area. # Upper 8 bits are interpreted as a partition number: # 0 --> partition 0 # 1 --> partition 1 # 2 --> partition 2 # 3 --> partition 3 # 0xff --> whatever software partition is in use # Default is 16KB before the start of the partition table.

TUNABLE_LIST.PARAM:
RWDATASET_MAXSIZE 16 0 0 0 0 0xffffffff A0xf000 1 4
# Size (in bytes) of the Read/Write DataSet area. # Default is 16KB.

PARAM.NAME: BOARD_DATA_ADDR
PARAM.DESC: # Address in DRAM of Board Data. # Default is to place Board Data dynamically.

PARAM.NAME: END_RAM_RESERVE_SZ
PARAM.DESC: # Number of bytes of Data RAM to reserve at the end of data space for custom uses. # Default is just sufficient to store DRAM-based DataSets.

PARAM.NAME: DSET_LIST_HEAD
PARAM.DESC: # Determine placement of DRAM DataSets. # Default is to place at end of DRAM.

PARAM.NAME: DESIRED_BAUD_RATE
PARAM.DESC: # Baud rate for the debug UART. # Should be a valid standard baud rate (9600, 19200, 38400, 57600, 115200) # Default is 115200.

PARAM.NAME: DBG_UART_TXPIN
PARAM.DESC: # GPIO pin to use for Tx on the debug UART # Default is pin 7.

PARAM.NAME: NUM_SOFTAP_CLIENTS
PARAM.DESC: # Number of SoftAP Clients # Default is 5

PARAM.NAME: QCOM_MEMPOOL_CHUNKSIZE
PARAM.DESC: #QCOM Mempool Chunk size determines the size of the chunks qcom_mem_pool allocates # from the system memory. #Smaller chunks lead to more overhead. #Requests from qcom_mem_alloc are satisfied from this pool. # Default is 4k; Minimum is 2k and Maximum is 4k

PARAM.NAME: HTTPC_BODY_MAXLEN
PARAM.DESC: # Max length od http client body. # Default is 1782.

PARAM.NAME: STACKGHOST_ATHOS_KEY_INTERVAL
PARAM.DESC: # StackGhost Athos Key Interval # This key interval is used to generate AthOS key periodically. # # NOTE : This value needs to be added as a new index, currently it is # using the same index as COUNTRY_CODE parameter (0x10). # # Default value is 120sec; Minimum is 30sec; Maximum is 3600sec(1 hour)

PARAM.NAME: STACKGHOST_COOKIE_FIXED
PARAM.DESC: # when StackGhost Cookie fixed, we could check more in stackghost mode. # Default is 0.
